results.title: A versatile port city
results.content: Noblessner, recognised as the best urban development in the Baltic countries, is situated by the sea, within a walking distance from Tallinn city centre and the Old Town. Kodusadam OÜ announces an open architectural competition for seaside buildings and urban space in Noblessner, Tallinn. * ### Ironman Tallinn in Noblessner 7 and 8 August 2021 ## Noblessner is located in Tallinn’s seaside Noblessner is Tallinn’s first district that is open to the sea and is very likely to please many people who enjoy life by the sea, close to the city centre, surrounded by culture venues, good restaurants and summertime seaside and city bustle. * About Noblessner

results.title: Noblessner- A Trendy New Seaside Quarter to Discover in ...
results.content: # Noblessner- A Trendy New Seaside Quarter to Discover in Tallinn ### A cool urban environment with magnificent seaside views not to miss while in Tallinn is the former submarine shipyard Noblessner Quarter. The former submarine shipyard Noblessner is the fastest developing, and thus the most interesting, area in Tallinn today. The original plans were never fulfilled, yet a huge submarine shipyard was built in the area now known as Noblessner. Noblessner wins your heart with its distinctive and colorful architecture, boldly combining old and new.
